pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 26  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 6, Poison $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Overworld at light level 0, Witch Huts, Raids, when a Villager is striked by a lightning bolt $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)
